name: Dice Souls (FeatureKreep)
description:
Beat the dungeon using nothing but wits, courage, and your trusty dice.
Roll the dice to determine your combat action and its effectiveness. Reroll for a different action at the cost of one effectiveness.

Upgrade your equipment, purchase new actions, and create your own custom dice.

Made for the GMTK Jam 2022 (theme: Roll of the dice)

Controls

Z/Space — roll the dice
X/Enter — confirm
Arrow keys — select

Credits

Art & coding: @FeatureKreep
Music: Retro Asobi (Linktree / Twitter)

Want to support me? You can donate to my ko-fi ☕
